results.title: The Weekenders
results.brief_description: The Weekenders is a Disney animated series about the weekend life of four diverse 7th graders: Tino Tonitini, Lorraine McQuarrie, Carver Descartes, and Petratishkovna Katsufrakis, voiced by veteran cartoon voice-actors: Jason Marsden, Grey DeLisle, Phil LaMarr, and Kath Soucie, respectively. It is stated at least once that the four main characters are each twelve years old. The setting is the fictional town of Bahia Bay, California. The show was created by Doug Langdale, later creator of Disney Channel’s Dave the Barbarian.
results.description: The Weekenders is a Disney animated series about the weekend life of four diverse 7th graders: Tino Tonitini, Lorraine McQuarrie, Carver Descartes, and Petratishkovna Katsufrakis, voiced by veteran cartoon voice-actors: Jason Marsden, Grey DeLisle, Phil LaMarr, and Kath Soucie, respectively. The show was created by Doug Langdale, later creator of Disney Channel’s Dave the Barbarian.

results.title: The Way of the Gun
results.creator_credit: Christopher McQuarrie, Maia Javan and Kenneth Kokin
results.brief_description: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Christopher McQuarrie, Maia Javan and Kenneth Kokin
results.description: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.
description_for_label: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

results.title: The Wax Mask
results.brief_description: Soon after a wax museum opens in Rome, a young man bets that he will spend the night in the museum. His dead body is found the morning after. More and more people begin disappearing, and more wax figures appear.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

results.description: Paris, 1900: a couple are horribly murdered by a masked man with a metal claw who rips their hearts out. The sole survivor and witness to the massacre is a young girl. Twelve years later in Rome a new wax museum is opened, whose main attractions are lifelike recreations of gruesome murder scenes. A young man bets that he will spend the night in the museum but is found dead the morning after. Soon, people start disappearing from the streets of Rome and the wax museum halls begin filling with new figures…
description_for_label: Paris, 1900: a couple are horribly murdered by a masked man with a metal claw who rips their hearts out. The sole survivor and witness to the massacre is a young girl. Twelve years later in Rome a new wax museum is opened, whose main attractions are lifelike recreations of gruesome murder scenes. A young man bets that he will spend the night in the museum but is found dead the morning after. Soon, people start disappearing from the streets of Rome and the wax museum halls begin filling with new figures…

results.title: The Usual Suspects
results.creator_credit: Bad Hat Harry Productions, Blue Parrot Productions, Bryan Singer, Christopher McQuarrie, Michael McDonnell, Howard Cummings and Louise Mingenbach
results.brief_description: Held in an L.A. interrogation room, Verbal Kint attempts to convince the feds that a mythic crime lord, Keyser Soze, not only exists, but was also responsible for drawing him and his four partners into a multi-million dollar heist.

constellations_other.name: Kylie to Lucy
constellations_other.description: 'Did It Again' started the conversation about Kylie Minogue being more than just a pop star, it started to cement her status as one of the most important audio and visual artists of her time, but the video had an unlikely inspiration.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Bad Hat Harry Productions, Blue Parrot Productions, Bryan Singer, Christopher McQuarrie, Michael McDonnell, Howard Cummings and Louise Mingenbach
results.description: Held in an L.A. interrogation room, Verbal Kint attempts to convince the feds that a mythic crime lord, Keyser Soze, not only exists, but was also responsible for drawing him and his four partners into a multi-million dollar heist that ended with an explosion in San Pedro harbor – leaving few survivors. Verbal lures his interrogators with an incredible story of the crime lord’s almost supernatural prowess.
description_for_label: Held in an L.A. interrogation room, Verbal Kint attempts to convince the feds that a mythic crime lord, Keyser Soze, not only exists, but was also responsible for drawing him and his four partners into a multi-million dollar heist that ended with an explosion in San Pedro harbor – leaving few survivors. Verbal lures his interrogators with an incredible story of the crime lord’s almost supernatural prowess.

results.title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
results.creator_credit: Parc Film, Madeleine Films, Beta Film, Jacques Demy, Bernard Evein, Jacqueline Moreau, Gilbert de Goldschmidt and Mag Bodard
results.brief_description: This simple romantic tragedy begins in 1957. Guy Foucher, a 20-year-old French auto mechanic, has fallen in love with 17-year-old Geneviève Emery, an employee in her widowed mother’s chic but financially embattled umbrella shop.

constellations_other.name: All about Agnes
constellations_other.description: Belgian director Agnes Varda was the only female director in the French New Wave movement and is known for her long career across influential documentary and dramas, and for her trademark humour, curiosity and insight.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Parc Film, Madeleine Films, Beta Film, Jacques Demy, Bernard Evein, Jacqueline Moreau, Gilbert de Goldschmidt and Mag Bodard
results.description: This simple romantic tragedy begins in 1957. Guy Foucher, a 20-year-old French auto mechanic, has fallen in love with 17-year-old Geneviève Emery, an employee in her widowed mother’s chic but financially embattled umbrella shop. On the evening before Guy is to leave for a two-year tour of combat in Algeria, he and Geneviève make love. She becomes pregnant and must choose between waiting for Guy’s return or accepting an offer of marriage from a wealthy diamond merchant.
description_for_label: This simple romantic tragedy begins in 1957. Guy Foucher, a 20-year-old French auto mechanic, has fallen in love with 17-year-old Geneviève Emery, an employee in her widowed mother’s chic but financially embattled umbrella shop. On the evening before Guy is to leave for a two-year tour of combat in Algeria, he and Geneviève make love. She becomes pregnant and must choose between waiting for Guy’s return or accepting an offer of marriage from a wealthy diamond merchant.

results.title: The Umbrella Academy
results.brief_description: A dysfunctional family of superheroes comes together to solve the mystery of their father’s death, the threat of the apocalypse and more.
results.description: A dysfunctional family of superheroes comes together to solve the mystery of their father’s death, the threat of the apocalypse and more.
description_for_label: A dysfunctional family of superheroes comes together to solve the mystery of their father’s death, the threat of the apocalypse and more.

results.title: The Twilight Zone
results.brief_description: A series of unrelated stories containing drama, psychological thriller, fantasy, science fiction, suspense, and/or horror, often concluding with a macabre or unexpected twist.

constellations_other.name: Good vibrations
constellations_other.description: Since its invention, the humble theremin has been used in a number of different ways to evoke all sorts of strange sounds and moods.

results.description: A series of unrelated stories containing drama, psychological thriller, fantasy, science fiction, suspense, and/or horror, often concluding with a macabre or unexpected twist.
description_for_label: A series of unrelated stories containing drama, psychological thriller, fantasy, science fiction, suspense, and/or horror, often concluding with a macabre or unexpected twist.

results.title: The Turning
results.creator_credit: Ashlee Page, Ian Meadows, Yaron Lifschitz, Rhys Graham, Shaun Gladwell, Anthony Lucas, Maggie Miles, Justin Kurzel, Stephen Page, Jub Clerc, Claire McCarthy, Marieka Walsh, Robert Connolly, Mia Wasikowska, Tony Ayres, Warwick Thornton, Simon Stone, Jonathan auf der Heide, David Wenham, MIFF Premiere Fund, Screen Australia and Arenamedia
results.brief_description: Seventeen talented Australian directors from diverse artistic disciplines each create a chapter of the hauntingly beautiful novel by Tim Winton. The overlapping stories explore the turning points in people’s lives in a stunning portrait of a small coastal community.

constellations_other.name: Canopy
constellations_other.description: John Harvey is a Torres Strait Islander producer, director and writer in screen and stage whose work Canopy celebrates Indigenous self-representation.

constellations_other.name: Tony Ayres
constellations_other.description: Charts the acclaimed career of Tony Ayres through his work in film and TV.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Ashlee Page, Ian Meadows, Yaron Lifschitz, Rhys Graham, Shaun Gladwell, Anthony Lucas, Maggie Miles, Justin Kurzel, Stephen Page, Jub Clerc, Claire McCarthy, Marieka Walsh, Robert Connolly, Mia Wasikowska, Tony Ayres, Warwick Thornton, Simon Stone, Jonathan auf der Heide, David Wenham, MIFF Premiere Fund, Screen Australia and Arenamedia
results.description: Seventeen talented Australian directors from diverse artistic disciplines each create a chapter of the hauntingly beautiful novel by multi award-winning author Tim Winton. The linking and overlapping stories explore the extraordinary turning points in ordinary people’s lives in a stunning portrait of a small coastal community. As characters face second thoughts and regret, relationships irretrievably alter, resolves are made or broken, and lives change direction forever.
description_for_label: Seventeen talented Australian directors from diverse artistic disciplines each create a chapter of the hauntingly beautiful novel by multi award-winning author Tim Winton. The linking and overlapping stories explore the extraordinary turning points in ordinary people’s lives in a stunning portrait of a small coastal community. As characters face second thoughts and regret, relationships irretrievably alter, resolves are made or broken, and lives change direction forever.

results.title: The Tribe
results.creator_credit: Hubert Bals Fund, Ukrainian State Film Agency, Myroslav Slaboshpytskyi, Vlad Odudenko and Olena Hres
results.brief_description: A film told entirely through sign language, The Tribe has a unique soundscape, shocking scenes and humanity.

constellations_other.name: Significant sounds
constellations_other.description: The arrival of synchronised sound dramatically changed the movie business, allowing filmmakers to use sound in new and exciting ways which developed the use sound into own film language.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Hubert Bals Fund, Ukrainian State Film Agency, Myroslav Slaboshpytskyi, Vlad Odudenko and Olena Hres
results.description: Deaf mute Sergey enters a specialized boarding school for deaf-and-dumb. In this new place, he needs to find his way through the hierarchy of the school’s network dealing with crimes and prostitution, the Tribe. By taking part of several robberies, he gets propelled higher into the organization. Then he meets one of the Chief’s concubines Anya, and unwillingly breaks all the unwritten rules of the tribe.
description_for_label: Deaf mute Sergey enters a specialized boarding school for deaf-and-dumb. In this new place, he needs to find his way through the hierarchy of the school’s network dealing with crimes and prostitution, the Tribe. By taking part of several robberies, he gets propelled higher into the organization. Then he meets one of the Chief’s concubines Anya, and unwillingly breaks all the unwritten rules of the tribe.

results.title: The Tracker
results.brief_description: Somewhere in Australia in the early 20th century outback, an Aboriginal man is accused of murdering a white woman. Three white men are on a mission to capture him with the help of an experienced Indigenous man.

constellations_other.name: David Gulpilil
constellations_other.description: David Gulpilil is a Yolngu man of the Mandhalpuyngu speech of the Djinba language. As a young boy, Gulpilil was an accomplished hunter, tracker and dancer, which he turned into an acclaimed film career that saw him win the Best Actor award at the Cannes Film Festival (for Charlie's Country) and an AACTA for The Tracker, among his many honours.

constellations_other.name: Place, portraiture, performance
constellations_other.description: The nature of the collaboration between David Gulpilil and Rolf De Heer on Ten Canoes connects the film to their other collaborations, and a number of other works as well.

results.description: Somewhere in Australia in the early 20th century outback, an Aboriginal man is accused of murdering a white woman. Three white men are on a mission to capture him with the help of an experienced Indigenous man.
